title: Substitute
text: Since we know $$d=180$$ and $$t=4.5$$, we can substitute $$180$$ for $$d$$ and $$4.5$$ for $$t$$ into the equation, which gives us $$180=4.5r$$.
speech: Since we know  d is equal to 180  and  t, is equal to 4.5 , we can substitute  180  for  d  and  4.5  for  t  into the equation, which gives us  180 is equal to 4.5 r .

title: Isolate
text: To isolate $$r$$, we can divide both sides by $$4.5$$.
